content:
## Report

### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Plate Smelting Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (3.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

Each furnace is fueled with coal and used for smelting iron ore into iron plates. The furnaces are currently operational and have been used to successfully produce iron plates.

#### Coal Extraction Site
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -83.5)

The burner mining drill is fueled with coal and is operational, extracting coal and depositing it into the wooden chest.

#### Iron Ore Extraction Site
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -51.5)

The burner mining drill is fueled and operational, extracting iron ore and depositing it into the wooden chest.

#### Copper Ore Extraction Site
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-28.5, -62.5)

The burner mining drill is fueled with coal and is operational, extracting copper ore and depositing it into the wooden chest.

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace contains the items you intend to extract. Attempting to extract items that are not present will result in an error.

#### Errors due to undefined variables
- Verify that all variables used in loops or functions are properly defined before use. This will prevent `NameError` exceptions.

#### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Check your inventory to ensure you have the items available before attempting to insert them into a furnace. Attempting to insert items not present in your inventory will result in an error.

#### Errors in crafting due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients for crafting are available in your inventory. If a crafting recipe requires items that cannot be crafted (e.g., raw resources), make sure to gather them first.

#### Errors in crafting due to missing sub-ingredients
- Verify that all sub-ingredients required for crafting a complex item are available. If a sub-ingredient cannot be crafted, ensure that you have gathered the necessary raw resources or crafted the required intermediate items.

#### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure that you have the entity in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map. Attempting to place an entity not present in your inventory will result in an error.

#### Errors when extracting from non-existent entities
- Ensure that the target entity exists and contains the items you intend to extract. Attempting to extract from an invalid or empty entity will result in an error.

#### Errors when extracting iron ore from an empty chest
- Verify that the chest contains iron ore before attempting to extract it. Repeated attempts to extract from an empty chest will result in errors.

#### Errors with iron ore extraction at position (-15.5, -51.5)
- Ensure that the burner mining drill is correctly positioned and operational to deposit iron ore into the chest. Repeated errors indicate that the chest may not be receiving iron ore from the drill. Check connections and drill status.

#### Errors when inserting items with non-positive quantities
- Ensure that the quantity of items to be inserted is a positive integer. Attempting to insert items with a non-positive count will result in an error.

#### Errors when attempting to extract or insert items with insufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have sufficient items in your inventory before attempting to extract or insert them. Attempting to perform these actions with insufficient items will result in errors.

#### Errors when inserting incompatible items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is empty or contains compatible items before inserting new items. Attempting to insert items like iron ore into a furnace already containing copper ore will result in an error.

#### Errors when extracting non-existent copper plates
- Verify that the furnace contains copper plates before attempting to extract them. Attempting to extract copper plates from a furnace without them will result in an error.

#### Errors when inserting coal without having it in inventory
- Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into a furnace. Attempting to insert coal without having it will result in an error.
